title: Episode 6: Bloog control center. Help!
content:
Hai!

I have a question about Keen 6, about episode 6: Bloog Control Center. I have no idea how to get further when I took the three keys: the yellow, green and blue one. And now? I hope you know what I mean. Otherwise check the map of episode 6 on the website. Thanks!

title: Re: Episode 6: Bloog control center. Help!
content:
--This post may spoil your Commander Keening experience (or it might not... you be the judge...)--



There's a sequence of doors you need to go through to proceed.

From memory, I think the sequence is:

- Enter the door in the first 'area' (the upper right 'section' of [url=http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/maps/maps-k6-lvl15.html]this[/url] map)
- Go through the first door in the room with the green blooglet, you'll arrive in the room with the yellow blooglet.
- Go through the third door in the room with the yellow blooglet.

You should end up falling out of the chute in the upper left section of the map (again, I'm referring to CCC314's map of the level).

title: Secret!
content: The trick is to pay attention to the number of Fudge-pops above each door. The ones you need to enter have extra treats above them...

title: Ooh
content:
That level is so much smaller than it seems in the game. Especially after seeing the huge maps that turn up in a lot of mods.

[hr]Xky The trick is to pay attention to the number of Fudge-pops above each door. The ones you need to enter have extra treats above them... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]
[hr]Oh, wow. I never made that connection before. I've always just run through door after door and fluked my way through it. This is handy to know.
